Text: I love rush but I really get bored listening to Mark Steyn.

Mark Steyn... boring?! 

Maybe some of the British / Canadian analogies are going over your head. That's one of the things I like; he always makes interesting parallels between the UK, Canada, and what America is becoming.

As a British citizen who currently lives in Canada, believe me when I say most of his "jokes" are actually the sad reality of the British commonwealth.

I believe Mark Steyn was born here in Canada, grew up in England and a whole assortment of other countries, moved back to Canada, left Canada a couple of years ago and now lives in Vermont. But I could be mistaking.

Actually Mr Steyn was born in Toronto and is still a Canadian citizen.  He grew up and went to school in the UK which explains his un-Canadian accent.  He now lives in New Hampshire.  

I always get a kick out of Mark's sense of humor.  His book "America Alone" is a must read and very thought provoking.

Thanks to the uploader.

Here's a little article about a Democrat's big mouth getting him into trouble in a way that even ol' "Plugs" Biden wouldn't have.  Well . . . probably.

http://sexandthe405.com/democrats-suck/
sorry guys I just dont care for him at all. I like Rush and thats about it.
I concur...Does anybody actually download his audio?...Its like Guantanamo Torture on the radio...END
